# % macro, DEVICE, device name

# % macro, SCAN,   scan rate


record(mbbi, "$(DEVICE):AL_STATE")
{
  field("DTYP", "asynInt32")
  field("INP",  "@asyn($(PORT))AL_STATE")
  field("SCAN", "$(SCAN)")
  field("ONVL", "1")
  field("TWVL", "2")
  field("THVL", "4")
  field("FRVL", "8")
  field("ONST", "INIT")
  field("TWST", "PREOP")
  field("THST", "SAFEOP")
  field("FRST", "OP")
}
